CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) |
| PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)) |
| polymer (unspecified in the paragraph) |
| PC71BM (2,7-Polydiacetylene-based material) |
| LiF (Lithium Fluoride) |
| Al (Aluminum) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) |
| PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)) |
| polymer: PC71BM (2,7-Polydiacetylene-based material) |
| LiF (Lithium Fluoride) |
| Al (Aluminum) |

Note: The "polymer" in the paragraph is not specific enough to identify a single material, but since it is mentioned in relation to the material name "PC71BM", it is included in the table as "polymer: PC71BM".
